ack.p: The authors thank the Equatorial Guinea government for facilitating this research, specifically, the Ministry for Agriculture and Forests (Sr. Ndjamba, Sra Eneme, Sr Teruel), the Governor of Annobón, and the Director General of INDEFOR. We also thank Lucrecia Bilé Osa Ahara, Iñaki Rodriguez Prieto, and Heidi Ruffler for their invaluable support in planning and implementing the field work, David Selden and Daniel Horton (AHVLA, UK) for assisting with LBV analyses and Meng Yu (AAHL, Australia) for helping with western blot analysis.
